name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Rafael J. SIMMONS-RIVERA, Appellee

judges: Justice MUNDY did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Rafael J. SIMMONS-RIVERA, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of July 2016, the Order of the Court of Common Pleas is AFFIRMED.
Justice MUNDY did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
143 A.3d 888
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Rafael J. SIMMONS-RIVERA, Appellee.
